sentence.Network_en: In a single effortless motion, he scooped Frannie into his arms.
sentence.Network_cn: 他一下子就轻松地把弗兰尼拥入怀里。

sentence.Network_en: She liked him above all for his effortless charm.
sentence.Network_cn: 她最喜欢他身上那种与生俱来的魅力。

sentence.Network_en: He played the piece with effortless artistry.
sentence.Network_cn: 他游刃有余地演奏了这首乐曲。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 全新版大学英语第二册单词表 - 豆丁网 ... take-off n. 起跳；起飞 effortless a. 容易的，不费力的 erruption n. 爆发.
...stiano的弹性(flexibility)跟他的不费吹灰之力(effortless)最让人著迷. 任何时候任何场合他都能够让自己漂亮(look pretty) 而且.
郑景婷考研英语高频词汇 - 豆丁网 ... effect 影响；导致—效果 445. effortless 毫不费力的 446. elaborate 详尽的 447.
earnest 认真的，诚挚的effortless 不费力的，容易的egalitarian 平等主义的

list.abs: his most effortless performance ever and it's the most difficult stuff to do .他有史以来最出色的性能，它是最困难的事情要做。
Movement and Carriage An effortless graceful movement demonstrating endurance while covering ground efficiently ., 轻松优美的动作 , 显示出耐力和有效的步伐.
the wrinkled forehead , tightly curled tail and swift , effortless gait ( resembling a racehorse trotting full out ) are typical of the breed .这个品种的典型特征是：前额有皱纹，尾巴紧紧卷曲，敏捷、轻松的步态（象赛马在全速奔跑)。
Lenny swooped Tom up in one swift , gentle , effortless motion .尼敏捷、温柔、不费力地扶起汤姆。

entry.def: Something that is effortless is done easily and well.

example.ex: In a single effortless motion, he scooped Frannie into his arms.
example.tran: 他一下子就轻松地把弗兰尼拥入怀里。
简单精致的意大利烹饪

entry.def: You use effortless to describe a quality that someone has naturally and does not have to learn.

example.ex: She liked him above all for his effortless charm.
example.tran: 她最喜欢他身上那种与生俱来的魅力。

means.word_mean: 1. requiring or apparently requiring no effort;

sentences.sentence: "the swallows glided in an effortless way through the busy air"
"a difficult feat performed with casual mastery"

auth_sentence.content: MGM were consistently munificent and we left...in effortless luxury.
auth_sentence.res_content: MGM were consistently munificent and we left...in effortless luxury.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: MGM were consistently munificent and we left...in effortless luxury.

auth_sentence.content: Effortless, serious funk with fantastic oomphy brass sections.
auth_sentence.res_content: Effortless, serious funk with fantastic oomphy brass sections.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Effortless, serious funk with fantastic oomphy brass sections.

auth_sentence.content: The grooves are tight and funky, the musicianship effortless.
auth_sentence.res_content: The grooves are tight and funky, the musicianship effortless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The grooves are tight and funky, the musicianship effortless.

stems_affixes.word_buile: bound边界+less无……的→adj.无限的,无边无际的
care关心+less无……的,不……的→不关心→粗心的,疏忽的
color颜色+less无……的,不……的→adj.无色的
doubt怀疑+less无……的,不……的→adj. 无疑的,确定的
effort努力+less无……的,不……的→adj.不费力的
fathom测量深度;长度单位[6英尺]+less无……的,不……的→没法测量→深不可测的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无错误的,无缺点的,完美的

flaw瑕疵+less无……的,不……的→adj.完美的,无瑕疵的
grace优美,文雅+less无……的,不……的→adj.粗俗的
hap机会,运气+less无→无运气的
help帮助+less无……的,不……的→adj.无助的,无能的,没用的
home家+less无……的,不……的→adj.无家可归的

regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的
relent变宽厚,变温和+less无……的,不……的→adj.无情的,残酷的
